item.title: 食油微生物提供诱人的清洁氢解决方案
item.description:
初创公司 Gold H2 已成功从加利福尼亚一个枯竭的油田中生产出氢气，并希望在全球完成其他试点项目。【原文：

Startup Gold H2 has successfully produced hydrogen from a depleted California oilfield, and it’s looking to finalize other pilots around the world.

】

item.title: 数百家公司必须在今年实现 ESG 目标，否则将赔款
item.description: 越来越多的公司面临着履行多年前向贷款人做出的可持续发展承诺的最后期限，这对环境、社会和公司治理债务市场的一个关键角落构成了考验。【原文：A growing number of companies are facing deadlines for sustainability commitments they made to lenders years ago, testing a key corner of the market for ESG debt.】

item.title: 特朗普税收法案中的公共土地出让受阻
item.description: 参议院提议出售数百万英亩公共土地，以帮助支付唐纳德-特朗普总统的大规模减税和支出方案，但遭到参议院规则制定者的阻挠。【原文：A Senate proposal to sell millions of acres of public land to help pay for President Donald Trump’s massive package of tax cuts and spending has been blocked by the Senate’s rule keeper.】

item.title: 英国将放弃受业界抨击的地区电力价格计划
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，英国政府准备否决一项有争议的计划，即把全国电力市场划分为若干区域，在全英范围内保留统一的电力批发价格。【原文：The UK government is poised to reject a controversial plan to divide the nation’s electricity market into zones, according to people familiar with the matter, retaining one wholesale power price throughout the UK.】

item.title: 热浪来袭，地中海各地发布野火警报
item.description: 随着西班牙、意大利和希腊部分地区气温飙升至 40 摄氏度（104 华氏度），整个地中海地区都发出了野火警报。【原文：Wildfire warnings were issued across the Mediterranean, as temperatures soar to 40C (104F) in parts of Spain, Italy and Greece.】

item.title: 印度农民自 6 月 20 日起增加水稻和豆类播种面积
item.description: 据印度农业部称，截至上周五，雨季播种水稻作物的面积比去年同期激增了58%，达到132万公顷（330万英亩）。【原文：The area allocated to monsoon-sown rice crops has surged 58% from a year earlier to 1.32 million hectares (3.3 million acres) as of Friday, according to India’s agriculture ministry.】

item.title: 如何帮助防止热浪期间停电
item.description:
公用事业部门警告说，极端高温可能会导致停电，但个人可以做出一些小小的改变来缓解电网压力。【原文：

Utilities have warned extreme heat can lead to power outages, but individuals can make small changes to ease stress on the grid.

】

item.title: 瑞士再保险公司称，保险公司在次生灾害中面临新机遇
item.description: 瑞士再保险公司（Swiss Re AG）中国分部负责人表示，能够预测重大自然灾害后的环境风险是保险业尚未开发的商机。【原文：Being able to predict the environmental risks that follow a major natural disaster represents an untapped business opportunity for the insurance sector, according to the head of reinsurance firm Swiss Re AG’s China unit.】

item.title: 中国有望在年底前启动全国电力市场
item.description: 中国主要的电网运营商表示，中国将如期在今年年底前启动全国统一的电力交易市场。【原文：China is on target to launch a unified national power trading market by the end of this year, according to its main electricity grid operator.】

item.title: 苏黎世保险称清洁能源资产面临承保风险
item.description: 旨在帮助应对气候变化的资产可能很快就会面临失去保险渠道的风险，除非它们能充分抵御极端天气事件。【原文：Assets designed to help fight climate change may soon risk losing access to insurance unless they’re adequately shielded from extreme weather events.】

item.title: 煤炭漏洞破坏银行削减化石燃料资金的承诺
item.description: 自《巴黎协定》签署以来的十年间，金融界一直在努力遏制污染最严重的化石燃料，而在这些地区，实际上存在着两种截然不同的煤炭类型— 以及两套截然不同的规则。【原文：In the parts of the financial world that have spent the decade since the Paris Agreement trying to curb the most-polluting fossil fuel, there are actually two distinct types of coal — with two very different sets of rules.】

item.title: 碳清除是英国的下一个工业前沿
item.description:
我国完全有能力成为全球领导者，但前提是现在就采取果断行动。【原文：

The nation is well positioned to become a global leader, but only if decisive action is taken now. 

】

item.title: Engie 称法国可再生能源禁令可能危及 50 亿欧元计划
item.description: 据 Engie SA 首席执行官凯瑟琳-麦格雷戈（Catherine MacGregor）称，法国正在讨论的能源法中包括暂停新的可再生能源项目，这将危及 Engie SA 正在考虑的未来 10 年 50 亿欧元（58 亿美元）的太阳能和风能项目。【原文：A moratorium on new renewables projects included in an energy law under discussion in France is endangering €5 billion ($5.8 billion) of solar and wind projects that Engie SA is considering over the next 10 years, according to Chief Executive Officer Catherine MacGregor.】

item.title: 纽约州计划新建核电站
item.description: 纽约计划建造一座核电站，这是美国 15 年多来首次新建大型核电站。【原文：New York plans to build a nuclear-power facility, the first major new plant undertaken in the US in more than 15 years.】

item.title: 会见致力于减排的气候领袖
item.description: 今天的时事通讯将介绍一些致力于减排和创造更公平未来的气候领袖。这篇报道是《彭博商业周刊》2025 年 7 月刊的一部分，全文可在 Bloomberg.com 上查阅。【原文：Today’s newsletter looks at some of the climate leaders working to cut emissions and create a more equitable future. The full version of the story, which is part of Bloomberg Businessweek’s July 2025 edition, can be found on Bloomberg.com.】

item.title: GE Vernova 将在安大略省建立小型反应堆服务中心
item.description: 安大略省将拥有世界上首个新型、小型核电站服务中心，因为该省正在采用一种被誉为能满足人工智能带来的激增电力需求的技术。【原文：Ontario will have the world’s first service center for a new, smaller kind of nuclear plant, as the province embraces a technology that’s been touted as a way to meet surging power demand from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 爱琴海海岛起火后希腊疏散西奥斯岛部分居民
item.description: 希腊疏散了爱琴海东部希俄斯岛的部分居民，消防员连夜奋战以控制周日爆发的大火。【原文：Greece evacuated parts of the east Aegean Sea island of Xios as firefighters battled overnight to contain blazes that broke out Sunday.】

item.title: 彭博绿色观察
item.description:
认识致力于减排和创造更公平未来的气候卫士。【原文：

Meet the climate champions working to cut emissions and create a more equitable future.

】

item.title: 中国的降雨正值煤炭和大坝行业的关键时刻
item.description: 中国西南部和中部地区连绵不断的暴雨正在灌满为中国巨大水坝提供水源的河流和水库，这对与水力发电竞争的煤炭市场构成了另一个威胁。【原文：The heavy rains rolling though southwestern and central China are filling up the rivers and reservoirs that feed the country’s mighty dams, posing another threat to the coal market that competes with hydropower in electricity generation.】

item.title: 英国将取消重工业绿色税收以促进增长
item.description: 英国政府在其新的十年工业战略中取消了绿色税收，以与外国竞争对手公平竞争并促进增长，这将降低多达 7000 家英国企业的能源成本。【原文：Energy costs will be cut for as many as 7,000 UK businesses as the government scraps green levies to level the playing field with foreign rivals and boost growth under its new ten-year Industrial Strategy.】

item.title: 美国最大电网发布周一高温能源紧急警报
item.description: 为大西洋中部至中西部地区约 20% 的美国人提供服务的 PJM Interconnection 宣布发出能源紧急警报，预计在酷热天气下电力需求将攀升至 14—year 新高。【原文：PJM Interconnection, which serves about 20% of Americans in the mid-Atlantic to the Midwest, declared an energy emergency alert with power demand expected to climb to a 14—year high amid intense heat.】

item.title: 机器人蜂箱和人工智能如何降低蜂群崩溃的风险
item.description:
在经历了 150 年的乏善可陈之后，蜂箱正在升级，从而更容易保护蜂群和依赖蜂群的农作物。【原文：

After 150 years without minimal innovation, the beehive is getting an upgrade that is making it easier to protect colonies and the crops that rely on them.

】

item.title: 日经新闻》称三菱将向美国太阳能发电投资 39 亿美元
item.description: 据《日经新闻》报道，三菱公司将投资 39 亿美元，通过其子公司促进美国的太阳能发电。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. will invest $3.9 billion to boost solar power generation in the US through its unit, the Nikkei newspaper reported.】

item.title: 专家警告：英国热浪本周可能夺走近 600 条生命
item.description: 科学家警告说，英国的老年人和其他弱势群体本周末有可能因高温而死亡，因为一项新的研究显示，最近的高温可能在四天多的时间里夺走 570 人的生命。【原文：Scientists have warned the elderly and other vulnerable groups in the UK are at risk of heat-related deaths this weekend, as a new study shows recent high temperatures could claim 570 lives in just over four days.】

item.title: 酷热将使美国最大电网的用电量达到 12 年来的最高点
item.description: 美国最大的电网为从华盛顿特区到伊利诺伊州近五分之一的美国人提供服务，由于酷热刺激了空调需求，其用电量预计将攀升至 12 年来的最高点。【原文：Electricity use on the biggest US grid, which serves nearly a fifth of Americans from Washington DC to Illinois, is expected to climb to a 12-year high as intense heat spurs air conditioning needs.】

item.title: 南非是中国天合光能每年千兆瓦的市场
item.description: 中国的天合光能公司地区总监表示，由于对大型项目的持续需求，该公司预计每年将向南非提供可发电千兆瓦的太阳能电池板和设备。【原文：China’s Trina Solar expects to annually supply South Africa with solar panels and equipment that can generate a gigawatt of power due to ongoing demand for large-scale projects, according to its regional director.】

item.title: 敦促法国立法者取消可再生能源项目暂停令
item.description: 法国的可再生能源产业敦促立法者放弃暂停批准新的太阳能和风能项目的立法提案，称这将破坏就业机会，并阻碍法国限制使用污染性化石燃料的计划。【原文：France’s renewable energy industry urged lawmakers to ditch proposed legislation that would impose a moratorium on approving new solar and wind projects, saying it would destroy jobs and stall the nation’s plan to curb its use of polluting fossil fuels.】

item.title: 日本加大力度遏制液化天然气供应链的甲烷泄漏
item.description: 日本正在加大力度减少液化天然气的甲烷排放，因为它坚持使用这种会加速气候变化的化石燃料。【原文：Japan is strengthening efforts to curtail methane emissions from liquefied natural gas as it sticks with a fossil fuel that’s accelerating climate change.】

item.title: 爱尔兰关闭最后一家煤电厂，欧洲加速淘汰煤炭
item.description: 爱尔兰成为最新一个终止燃煤发电的欧洲国家，西班牙和意大利也将很快跟进。【原文：Ireland became the latest European country to put an end to coal-fired power generation, with Spain and Italy set to follow soon.】

item.title: 七月炎热天气给欧洲电力供应带来压力
item.description: 据研究公司 Energy Aspects 称，今年夏天欧洲更炎热的天气有可能导致需求上升，同时导致水电和核电厂的产量下降。【原文：Hotter weather in Europe this summer risks driving up demand while causing output from hydropower and nuclear plants to fall, according to research firm Energy Aspects.】
